title: Patcher freezes, computer freezes, everything freezes
body:
So, since a random moment in time I am not able to play LoL anymore. I have a decent computer; Lenovo T430. I´ve always played LoL on this computer flawlessly.

The problems start when I am trying to install the new patch. Suddenly, at a random moment, the patcher completely crashes, causing my computer to crash; even ctrl alt delete isnt working. I have to turn the computer off and on manually to get it working again (with the power button).
What can cause this?

Fyi: i´ve updated my drivers, I have windows7, I´ve reinstalled the game 5 times. I´ve done stuff with my firewall. Nothing works. 

I really want to get out bronze so pls halp

thanks in advance!

replies.body:
This could be a pretty serious issue if your pc is just crashing while patching.  Is it happening any other time?  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case, and our tech team can work with you towards figuring this out.

If possible, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and attach it to the ticket for more context.
